Articles.Content:
Hello. I'm wondering if anyone could help me to make my career mode into more of a Science Mode with contracts.

Basically, I want the Funds in Career mode to be endless. One contract awards millions. Is there a simple way to alter funds gained beyond 1000%?

Thank you.
Go to space center view, open debug menu, go to cheats tab, tap and hold alt for 5 seconds, simple clicky-clicky from there on.

Edit your save? If you follow the path: Kerbal Space Program/saves/YourSavedGameHere and then edit the persistence file in Notepad or similar, you can change all sorts of things, like Funds, Science Points etc. Hope this helps.
